Summary INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY Director & Program Management (Intel Corporation, Numonyx B.V, and Micron Technology) - focus Customer support, Merger and Acquisitions Project, System Integration, Operational Excellence, Information Security, Strategic Objective and Divisional Goals alignment 
 
Customer Support and Organizational leadership across the enterprise - South America, Europe, Asia, & the U.S with key focus on

Customer Support and Organizational leadership across the enterprise - South America, Europe, Asia, & the U.S with key focus on 
 
■ IT Strategic Management ■ Organizational Development ■ M&A integration ■ Cyber Security ■ Executive Collaboration ■ Startups ■ SLAs ■ Global Teams ■ Result Oriented Service Delivery and Program Management (Manufacturing Integration) Experience Program Manager & IT Director - Systems and Process Engineering Micron Technology May 2010  – Present (5 years 4 months) Singapore Post Merger integration of systems and processes (Manufacturing, Supply Chain, Planning & Finance Systems). S Infrastructure and application with Business, Finance and HR (Singapore) 
 
Information Technology Director - Philippines and Malaysia. Production and customer support, Post Merger Integration. Change Management and KPI generation and compliance. Information Technology Director Numonyx March 2006  –  March 2010  (4 years 1 month) Global Led the IS organization across multiple geographies to achieve high level of production Operational Excellence while driving strategic emerging programs -  
- IT and business system integration as part of the new spin off (Program Management: Order to Cash Integrated set of projects) 
- Vendor and Third party software and hardware development scope of work including negotiation, deliverables, and monitoring to meet business objective 
- Organizational Management - Hiring, team development, performance expectation, rewards and recognition 
- Stakeholder Management: Communication to team members, senior Managers and the executives. 
- Service Management, and Problem Management, Change Management, Vendor Management, and Client Services and support IT Manager - Global System Services Intel Corporation 1990  –  2006  (16 years) Albuquerque, New Mexico Area IT Customer Relations and Business Integration support 24x7 production support.  
 
Met goals for next-generation production demands, reducing downtime nearly 70% with use of emerging technologies that improved systems availability. 
 
Retained and motivated top IT talent with changes to HR policies allowing job rotation programs; mentored and sponsored emerging IT leaders through promotions into management roles. 
 
Spearheaded Technical Leadership program designed to develop new IT managers; inspired team to submit technical papers—including topic accepted at Design Test Technology Conference—on on subjects including test program release management and virtualization in test environment builds. 
 
Facilitated Flash division separation, serving as technology champion driving “carve out” and “standup” plans. 
 
Spearheaded programs and measures to protect key manufacturing sites from cyber attacks, implementing cutting-edge information security policies, mitigation plans, and monitoring systems. Directed 75+ database, Windows, and integration technology professionals in 5-county region, and managed multiple, global stakeholders in 6 facilities. 
 
Served as Program Manager bringing in high-profile virtualization test facility on time and within budget, improving accuracy and system availability with accurate release management procedures. 
 
Commended for building first IT manufacturing test integration facility in Malaysia, increasing project success rate with ability to test security patches; cut manufacturing automation process/test replication downtime. 
 
Intensified information security effectiveness, developing quantifiable measurement tools. Summary •	General Management 
o Over 20 years work experience at big international semiconductor companies in engineering, 
line management, project / program and operations management positions 
 
•	Program 
o Excellent program/project management performance 
o Experience in multisite and multinational big projects (system, SW, HW) 
 
•	People  
o Great success in motivation and people management 
 
•	Customer & Marketing 
o Strong customer orientation & strong multicultural communication 
o Business implementation experience (strategy, roadmap, business plan) 
 
•	Methodology 
o Well-structured and solution orientated workflow on very complex subjects.  
o Highly developed customer requirement management,  
o Concept and architecture methodologies  
o Very innovative and realistic implementation approach & leadership 
 
•	Execution 
o Clear decisions with focus strategy and success driven behavior 
o Operation excellence and organization development  
o Very efficient, optimized and effective process and execution capabilities 
 
•	Technology 
o Vast engineering experience, deep technical knowledge and fast learner 
o In former positions high level technical expert in audio, automotive, mobile communication
